channel.title: How do I make my server public?
channel.description:
I was wondering how I make my server public.... I can get on myself with 0.0.0.0 but I have no idea how other people can get on...?
Help please!

item.title: How do I make my server public?
item.dc:creator: @ziziz ziziz
item.description:
@ziziz wrote:

get hamachi & log in with your hamachi IP & then make sure your source runs on silab or you have a good client for other people. if other people join ur hamachi network then join the game with ur hamachi ip then ta-da

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make my server public?
